Eerie Presence.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Reduce the Cooldown of Mending Spirits by {scale=0.5|0.5}s if you miss.

Feed the Spirits.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting an Elimination.

Fleeting.card_desc: [Slither] Reduce the Cooldown of Slither by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Lighter Gourd.card_desc: [Gourd] Increase the Projectile Speed of Gourd by {scale=10|10}%.

Liminal Passage.card_desc: [Slither] Increase the travel distance of Slither by {scale=10|10}%.

Many Gourds.card_desc: [Gourd] Reduce the Cooldown of Gourd by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Otherworldly.card_desc: [Slither] Gain a {scale=75|75}-health Shield for 3s after Slither ends.

Possession.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=4|4}% while Healing an ally with Mending Spirits.

Ripened Gourd.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Your Gourd no longer damages enemies, but it Heals for twice as much.

Ritual Magic.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Heal for {scale=15|15} every 1s while Healing an ally with Mending Spirits.

Spirit's Chosen.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Mending Spirits immediately Heals your target for an additional 200.

Sustenance.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Healing received by {scale=8|8}% while at or below 50% Health.

Swift Spirits.card_desc: [Mending Spirits] Increase the Movement Speed of allies affected by Mending Spirits by {scale=5|5}%.

Venomous Gourd.card_desc: [Gourd] Standing in your Gourd grants yourself and allies {scale=6|6}% Lifesteal.

Wekono's Wrath.card_desc: [Weapon] Tossing your snake after reloading is faster and deals an additional 500 damage.

Bote der Geister.card_desc: [Heilende Geister] Heilende Geister heilt direkt zusätzliche 200 LP.

Faulige Kalebasse.card_desc: [Kalebasse] Nach Aktivierung von Kalebasse wirst du {scale=75|75} LP geheilt.

Flinke Geister.card_desc: [Heilende Geister] Erhöht das Lauftempo von Verbündeten um {scale=5|5}%, während sie mit Heilende Geister geheilt werden.

Fl\u00fcchtig.card_desc: [Schlängeln] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schlängeln um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Geisterhand.card_desc: [Schlängeln] Nach Verwendung von Schlängeln wirst du {scale=80|80} LP geheilt.

Geistermahl.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Gereifte Kalebasse.card_desc: [Heilende Geister] Kalebasse fügt Gegnern keinen Schaden mehr zu, heilt aber dafür doppelt so viel.

Giftige Kalebasse.card_desc: [Kalebasse] Innerhalb des Gebiets von Kalebasse erhalten du und Verbündete {scale=6|6}% Lebensraub.

Jenseits.card_desc: [Schlängeln] Wenn Schlängeln endet, erhältst du einen 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=75|75} LP.

K\u00f6rperlos.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Leichte Kalebasse.card_desc: [Kalebasse] Erhöht das Geschosstempo von Kalebasse um {scale=10|10}%.

Ritualmagie.card_desc: [Heilende Geister] Während du einen Verbündeten mit Heilende Geister heilst, wirst du {scale=15|15} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

S\u00e4ttigung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=8|8}% erhöhte Heilung.

Schaurige Pr\u00e4senz.card_desc: [Heilende Geister] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Heilende Geister um {scale=0.5|0.5}s, wenn du nicht triffst.

Schwellengang.card_desc: [Schlängeln] Erhöht die Reichweite von Schlängeln um {scale=10|10}%.

\u00dcbernahme.card_desc: [Heilende Geister] Während du einen Verbündeten mit Heilende Geister heilst, wird von dir erlittener Schaden um {scale=4|4}% reduziert.

Viele Kalebassen.card_desc: [Kalebasse] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Kalebasse um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Zorn des Wekono.card_desc: [Waffe] Das Werfen der Schlange beim Nachladen geschieht schneller und verursacht 500 Bonusschaden.

Autre monde.card_desc: [Serpenter] Serpenter génère un bouclier de {scale=75|75} PV qui dure 3s.

Courroux de Wekono.card_desc: [Arme] Le lancer de serpent après un rechargement est plus rapide et inflige 500 dégâts de plus.

\u00c9chapp\u00e9e.card_desc: [Serpenter] La distance parcourue lors de Serpenter augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

\u00c9lu des esprits.card_desc: [Esprit soigneur] Esprit soigneur redonne instantanément 200 PV de plus.

Esprits repus.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Esprits vifs.card_desc: [Esprit soigneur] Esprit soigneur octroie {scale=5|5}% de vitesse aux alliés atteints.

Gourde \u00e0 venin.card_desc: [Gourde] Dans la zone de Gourde, vous et vos alliés avez {scale=6|6}% de drain de vie.

Gourde l\u00e9g\u00e8re.card_desc: [Gourde] La vitesse du projectile de Gourde augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Gourde trop m\u00fbre.card_desc: [Esprit soigneur] La Gourde rend deux fois plus de PV mais n'inflige plus aucun dégât.

Magie rituelle.card_desc: [Esprit soigneur] Vous récupérez {scale=15|15} PV/s tant que vous soignez un allié avec Esprit soigneur.

Possession.card_desc: [Esprit soigneur] Vous subissez {scale=4|4}% de dégâts en moins tant que vous soignez un allié avec Esprit soigneur.

Subsistance.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=8|8}% de soins en plus.

Surnaturel.card_desc: [Esprit soigneur] Esprit soigneur se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite quand vous ratez votre coup.

\u4eea\u5f0f\u9b54\u6cd5I.card_desc: [恢复之灵] 用恢复之灵治疗目标时自身也会每秒回复{scale=15|15}点生命值

\u523a\u9f3b\u846b\u82a6.card_desc: [巫毒葫芦] 巫毒葫芦命中敌人后会使敌方显形，持续{scale=0.8|0.8}秒

\u5267\u6bd2\u846b\u82a6I.card_desc: [巫毒葫芦] 被巫毒葫芦命中的敌人受到的治疗效果降低{scale=10|10}%，持续3秒

\u591a\u91cd\u846b\u82a6I.card_desc: [巫毒葫芦] 降低巫毒葫芦的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u5929\u9009\u4e4b\u4eba.card_desc: [恢复之灵] 恢复之灵会立即为目标回复300点生命，然后再附加后续治疗效果

\u6050\u6016\u5316\u8eab.card_desc: [恢复之灵] 技能未命中目标时，冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u6301\u7eed\u8865\u7ed9I.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于50%时获得的治疗效果提高{scale=8|8}%

\u6781\u9650\u901a\u9053I.card_desc: [蛇行突进] 突进距离提高 {scale=10|10}%

\u865a\u65e0\u7075\u4f53I.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u86c7\u7075\u4e4b\u6012.card_desc: [武器] 毒蛇投掷造成额外500点伤害

\u86c7\u7075\u4e4b\u89e6I.card_desc: [蛇行突进] 激活蛇行突进会回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u86c7\u7075\u796d\u54c1I.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人或助攻可以使所有主动技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u86c7\u7075\u8bc5\u5492.card_desc: [恢复之灵] 恢复之灵现在可对敌人使用，2秒内造成560点伤害

\u86c7\u7075\u9644\u8eabI.card_desc: [恢复之灵] 用恢复之灵治疗目标时获得{scale=4|4}%的伤害减免

\u8d85\u51e1I.card_desc: [蛇行突进] 突进结束后提高{scale=10|10}%的移动速度，持续3秒

\u8f7b\u8d28\u846b\u82a6I.card_desc: [巫毒葫芦] 葫芦的投掷速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u8fc5\u6377\u4e4b\u7075I.card_desc: [恢复之灵] 使用恢复之灵治疗目标后也会提高目标{scale=7|7}%的移动速度

\u98de\u901dI.card_desc: [蛇行突进] 蛇行突进的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

Alimento espiritual.card_desc: [Armadura] Tus recargas activas se reducen un {scale=10|10}% tras conseguir una eliminación.

Elegido por los esp\u00edritus.card_desc: [Espíritus sanadores] Espíritus sanadores cura 200 PS más al objetivo instantáneamente.

Esp\u00edritus raudos.card_desc: [Espíritus sanadores] La velocidad de movimiento de los aliados afectados por Espíritus sanadores aumenta un {scale=5|5}%.

Fugacidad.card_desc: [Serpenteo] Se reduce la recarga de Serpenteo en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Incorp\u00f3reo.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Ira de Wekono.card_desc: [Arma] Tiras tu serpiente tras recargar más rápido e infliges 500 PS de daño adicionales.

J\u00edcara acre.card_desc: [Jícara] Te curas {scale=75|75} PS tras activar Jícara.

J\u00edcara \u00e1gil.card_desc: [Jícara] La velocidad de proyectil de Jícara aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

J\u00edcara madura.card_desc: [Espíritus sanadores] Tu jícara ya no daña a los enemigos, pero cura el doble.

J\u00edcara venenosa.card_desc: [Jícara] Si te quedas dentro de tu Jícara, tú y tus aliados reciben un {scale=6|6}% de robo de vida.

J\u00edcaras m\u00faltiples.card_desc: [Jícara] Se reduce la recarga de Jícara en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Pasaje liminal.card_desc: [Serpenteo] La distancia que puede recorrer Serpenteo aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Posesi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Espíritus sanadores] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=4|4}% mientras curas a un aliado con Espíritus sanadores.

Presencia inquietante.card_desc: [Espíritus sanadores] Se reduce la recarga de Espíritus sanadores en {scale=0.5|0.5}s si no aciertas.

Ritual m\u00e1gico.card_desc: [Espíritus sanadores] Te curas {scale=15|15} PS cada 1s mientras curas a un aliado con Espíritus sanadores.

Roce espiritual.card_desc: [Serpenteo] Te curas {scale=80|80} PS tras usar Serpenteo.

Sobrenatural.card_desc: [Serpenteo] Ganas un escudo de {scale=75|75} PS durante 3s después de que acabe Serpento.

Sustento.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación que recibes aumenta un {scale=8|8}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Trampa serpentina.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=2|2}%.

Alimente os Esp\u00edritos.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% todos os intervalos ativos ao conseguir uma eliminação.

Caba\u00e7a Leve.card_desc: [Cabaça] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade de arremesso da Cabaça.

Caba\u00e7a Madura.card_desc: [Espírito de Cura] Sua Cabaça não causa mais dano nos inimigos, mas concede o dobro de cura.

Caba\u00e7a Pungente.card_desc: [Cabaça] Você se cura em {scale=75|75} de vida após arremessar a Cabaça.

Caba\u00e7as Venenosas.card_desc: Cabaça] Você e seus aliados ganham {scale=6|6}% de roubo de vida enquanto estiverem sobre a área da Cabaça

Escolhido dos Esp\u00edritos.card_desc: [Espírito de Cura] Espírito de Cura imediatamente cura um adicional de 200 de vida.

Esp\u00edritos Velozes.card_desc: [Espírito de Cura] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a velocidade de movimento dos aliados afetados pelo Espírito de Cura.

Fugaz.card_desc: [Deslizar] Reduz o intervalo de Deslizar em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Incorp\u00f3reo.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Ira de Wekono.card_desc: [Arma] O arremesso da cobra após recarregar a arma é mais rápido e causa dano adicional de 500.

Magia Ritual\u00edstica.card_desc: [Espírito de Cura] Você se cura em {scale=15|15} de vida a cada 1s enquanto Espírito de Cura estiver curando um aliado.

Passando na Frente.card_desc: [Deslizar] Aumenta a distância que Deslizar percorre em {scale=10|10}%.

Po\u00e7o de Cobras.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=2|2}%.

Possess\u00e3o.card_desc: [Espírito de Cura] Você ganha {scale=4|4}% de redução de dano enquanto um aliado é curado pelo Espírito de Cura.

Presen\u00e7a Arrepiante.card_desc: [Espírito de Cura] Reduz o intervalo de Espírito de Cura em {scale=0.5|0.5}s caso você erre.

Sustento.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a cura recebida em {scale=8|8}% enquanto estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

Toque do Esp\u00edrito.card_desc: [Deslizar] Você se cura em {scale=80|80} de vida após usar Deslizar.

Transcendental.card_desc: [Deslizar] Ganha um escudo de {scale=75|75} por 3s após concluir Deslizar.

V\u00e1rias Caba\u00e7as.card_desc: [Cabaça] Reduz o intervalo da Cabaça em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0435\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0413\u043d\u0435\u0432 \u0412\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Змеиный бросок после перезарядки становится быстрее и наносит на 500 ед. больше урона.

\u0416\u0443\u0442\u043a\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Дух целителя] Промахи сокращают перезарядку Духа целителя на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0417\u0440\u0435\u043b\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Дух целителя] Тыква больше не наносит врагам урона, но ее эффект исцеления удвоен.

\u0418\u0437\u0431\u0440\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Дух целителя] Дух целителя мгновенно исцеляет выбранную цель еще на 200 ед.

\u041a\u0430\u0441\u0430\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Пресмыкающееся] После использования Пресмыкающегося вы исцеляетесь на {scale=80|80} ед.

\u041d\u0430\u043a\u043e\u0440\u043c\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041e\u0434\u0435\u0440\u0436\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Дух целителя] Вы получаете на {scale=4|4}% меньше урона во время исцеления союзника Духом целителя.

\u041f\u0438\u043a\u0430\u043d\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Тыква] Активация Тыквы исцеляет вас на {scale=75|75} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u0434\u0434\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=8|8}% больше исцеления.

\u041f\u043e\u0442\u0443\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Пресмыкающееся] По окончании действия Пресмыкающегося вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=75|75} ед. на 3 с.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Дух целителя] Скорость передвижения союзников под действием Духа целителя повышается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0420\u0438\u0442\u0443\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Дух целителя] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=15|15} ед. в секунду во время исцеления союзника Духом целителя.

\u042f\u0434\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Тыква] В области действия Тыквы вы и ваши союзники получаете эффект вампиризма {scale=6|6}%.

Bezcielesno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Dojrza\u0142a tykwa.card_desc: [Duchy naprawcze] Twoja Tykwa nie zadaje już obrażeń wrogom, ale przywraca dwa razy więcej PZ.

Dotyk ducha.card_desc: [Ślizg] Przywraca ci {scale=80|80} PZ po użyciu Ślizgu.

Gniew Wekono.card_desc: [Broń] Rzut wężem po przeładowaniu jest szybszy i zadaje 500 dodatkowych obrażeń.

Karmienie duch\u00f3w.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Op\u0119tanie.card_desc: [Duchy naprawcze] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=4|4}% podczas leczenia sojusznika przez Duchy naprawcze.

Pokonanie progu.card_desc: [Ślizg] Zwiększa dystans pokonany przez Ślizg o {scale=10|10}%.

Po\u017cywienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane leczenie o {scale=8|8}%, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Rytua\u0142 magiczny.card_desc: [Duchy naprawcze] Przywraca {scale=15|15} PZ co 1 s podczas leczenia sojuszników przez Duchy naprawcze.

Tykwa za tykw\u0105.card_desc: [Tykwa] Skraca czas odnowienia Tykwy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Ulotno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Ślizg] Skraca czas odnowienia Ślizgu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Upiorna obecno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Duchy naprawcze] Redukuje czas odnowienia Duchów naprawczych o {scale=0.5|0.5} s, jeśli oddany zostanie niecelny strzał.

Wybraniec ducha.card_desc: [Duchy naprawcze] Duchy naprawcze natychmiast przywracają twojemu celowi dodatkowe 200 PZ.

Z za\u015bwiat\u00f3w.card_desc: [Ślizg] Zapewnia tarczę o odporności {scale=75|75} pkt. na 3 s po zakończeniu Ślizgu.

Zatrute tykwy.card_desc: [Tykwa] Stanie w twojej Tykwie zapewnia tobie i sojusznikom {scale=6|6}% kradzieży życia.

Zwinne duchy.card_desc: [Duchy naprawcze] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu sojuszników leczonych przez Duchy naprawcze o {scale=5|5}%.

Ba\u015fka D\u00fcnyadan.card_desc: [Kayma] Kayma bittikten sonra 3sn boyunca {scale=75|75} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

Destek.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Can veya altındayken aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=8|8} artır.

\u0130vedi Ruhlar.card_desc: [İyileştirici Ruhlar] İyileştirici Ruhlar'dan etkilenen müttefiklerin Hareket Hızını %{scale=5|5} artır.

Olgun Kabarc\u0131k.card_desc: [İyileştirici Ruhlar] Kabarcık'ın düşmanlara hasar vermez ancak iki kat daha fazla İyileştirir.

Ruhlar\u0131 Besle.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Ruhlar\u0131n Kontrol\u00fcnde.card_desc: [İyileştirici Ruhlar] İyileştirici Ruhlar ile bir müttefiki iyileştirirken aldığın hasarı %{scale=4|4} azalt.

Se\u00e7ilmi\u015f Ruh.card_desc: [İyileştirici Ruhlar] İyileştirici Ruhlar hedefini anında ek 200 Can İyileştirir.

S\u0131n\u0131rda Ge\u00e7i\u015f.card_desc: [Kayma] Kayma ile kat ettiğin mesafeyi %{scale=10|10} artır.

Tekinsiz Varl\u0131k.card_desc: [İyileştirici Ruhlar] Iskaladığında İyileştirici Ruhlar'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

T\u00f6ren B\u00fcy\u00fcs\u00fc.card_desc: [İyileştirici Ruhlar] İyileştirici Ruhlar ile bir müttefiki iyileştirirken her 1 saniyede {scale=15|15} Can iyileş.

Wekono'nun Gazab\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Yeniden doldurma sonrası yılan fırlatma hızlanır ve ek 500 hasar verir.

Zehirli Kabarc\u0131klar.card_desc: [Kabarcık] Kabarcık'ının içinde durmak sana ve müttefiklerini %{scale=6|6} Can Çalma verir.
